name: Blood Hunter
shortDescription: Grim warriors who wield hemocraft to hunt monsters at the cost of their own blood.
description: Blood Hunters are martial combatants who manipulate their own vitality to fuel supernatural abilities. Through forbidden rites and grim resolve, they stand against the darkest threats.

features.name: Hunterâ€™s Bane
features.description: You undergo a dangerous rite that binds you to hemocraft magic. You gain advantage on Survival checks to track fiends, fey, or undead, and on Intelligence checks to recall information about them.

features.name: Blood Maledict
features.description: You can channel hemocraft to curse creatures as a bonus action. You know one Blood Curse and can use it once per short rest.

features.name: Fighting Style
features.description: You adopt a particular style of fighting as your specialty.

features.name: Crimson Rite
features.description: You can imbue a weapon with elemental energy by sacrificing your own vitality, adding extra damage of a chosen type.

subclass.label: Blood Hunter Order
subclass.description: Choose an order that defines your hemocraft discipline.

features.name: Ability Score Improvement
features.description: Increase one ability score by 2, or two ability scores by 1.

features.name: Extra Attack
features.description: You can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

features.name: Brand of Castigation
features.description: You can brand a creature you damage, punishing it for harming you or allies.

features.name: Blood Hunter Order Feature

features.name: Grim Psychometry
